item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: November 29, 2024 Today's Verse Psalm 28:1â€“2 Of David. [1] To you, O LORD, I call; my rock, be not deaf to me, lest, if you be silent to me, I become like those who go down to the pit. [2] Hear the voice of my pleas for mercy, when I cry to you for help, when I lift up my hands toward your most holy sanctuary. This Year's Memory Verse Review Isaiah 40:28 - Have you not known?
